doc:description.doc:para: net.sourceforge.ktoshiba.ktoshhelper is a DBus interface implemented by KToshiba. It allows several actions (if supported) to be controlled like TouchPad and ECO led state.

doc:doc.doc:summary: The value to set the screen backlight brightness.

doc:description.doc:para: Set the brightness level of the screen backlight.

doc:errors.doc:error: if an error occured while setting the brightness
